system.effect: Affixed to Backpack, Helmet, or other similarly worn item. Set aflame as a Half Action and burns for 2 hours. Whilst alight acts as Glow-Globe, and grants +30 to Charm and Command Tests, and +10 to Intimidate Tests, but -40 to Stealth Tests. If wearer is knocked prone whilst it is lit must make +10 Agility Test or be set on fire.
